Description: Blue-green glazed composition aryballos, in the form of a hedgehog.
Bibliographic references: Webb 1978 / Archaic Greek Faience, Miniature scent bottles and related objects from East Greece, 650-500BC (no 911) (Thebes mistakenly given as findplace)
Condition: fair (incomplete -spout, handle and part of face missing)
